page.title: 15Social Concerns
page.content: In 1985 the main items of social concern in{Montrose}are the growing problems of solvent and drug abuse amongst young people;vandalism;rising unemployment and the lack of opportunities for school leavers.{ Problems such as solvent and drug abuse,vandalism and rising unemploy- ment are national problems,but they do affect{Montrose}to a certain extent. Two problems causing considerable public disquiet are the proposed by-pass road and the unpleasant taste of{Montrose's}drinking water.Each suggested route for the by-pass has not met with general approval while excessive amounts of additives have,in the past,made the water almost undrinkable.The latter problem has now been rectified.
